title: English Conversation Topics - At a Wine Bar

json.text: Are you interested in expanding your English conversation topics?
In this video, I’ll share with you a simple, useful English conversation that you can use immediately
to start learning English quickly and without overwhelm.
Stay tuned.
At a wine bar
Hi bartender. Can I please see the wine menu?
Certainly. Here you go.
This is a great menu. What do you recommend?
Do you like red wine or white wine.
I like both.
Of the reds, I would recommend the Australian Shiraz.
Of the whites, I would recommend the New Zealand Sauvignon Blanc.
The French Rose is also very nice.
I will start with a glass of the Sauvignon Blanc.
Would you like anything to accompany your wine?
The cheese platter goes very well with the Sauvignon Blanc.
That sounds lovely. I will order the cheese platter as well.
How many glasses would you like?
Two please. For my husband and I.
I will bring over your wine and the cheese platter in a moment.
Can I also have some water as well?
No problem. Won’t be long.
Thank you.
If you enjoyed this video, subscribe to my channel. And if you’re looking for more
English learning help, make sure to click on the link and get my English conversation
practice video and worksheet. To get your hands on them, simply click the
link right here, or the link in the description box.
Thanks for watching and I’ll see you in the next video.
